price: he would have stayed in its belly until the Day of Resurrection[32].
arabic: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطۡنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ
footnotes: [32] The belly of the fish would have turned to be his grave.
